title: Teachers surveyed say accessible tech is needed now more than ever - Microsoft
content: Teachers surveyed say accessible tech is needed now more than ever  Microsoft
description: Each day, teachers and school leaders are faced with the challenge of meeting the needs of a growing audience of diverse learners to help them reach their full potential. Nearly half of teachers work one-on-one with students who require accommodations. In celebration of Global Accessibility Awareness Day, we’re building on that work to share new research that speaks to the accessibility needs of today’s classrooms.
